entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
